plugin.name: swift-maven-plugin
plugin.description: The Maven swift plugin generates source code from Thrift IDL files. It is aimed at generating code for the swift framework of annotation based Java thrift classes but could be used with any programming language by adding code generation templates.

mojo.description: Process IDL files and generates source code from the IDL files.

parameter.name: addCloseableInterface
parameter.description: Have generated services extend Closeable and a close method.

parameter.name: addThriftExceptions
parameter.description: Add TException to each method signature. This exception is thrown when a thrift internal error occurs.

parameter.name: codeFlavor
parameter.description: Select the flavor of the generated source code. Default is 'java-regular'.

parameter.name: defaultPackage
parameter.description: Give a default Java package for generated classes if the IDL files do not contain a java namespace definition. This package is only used if the IDL files do not contain a java namespace definition.

parameter.name: extendRuntimeException
parameter.description: Generated exceptions extends RuntimeException, not Exception.

parameter.name: fallbackToPlainJavaNamespace
parameter.description: Use the 'java' namespace if 'java.swift' namespace is not present.

parameter.name: generateIncludedCode
parameter.description: Generate code for included IDL files. If true, generate Java code for all IDL files that are listed in the idlFiles set and all IDL files loaded through include statements. Default is false (generate only code for explicitly listed IDL files).

parameter.name: outputFolder
parameter.description: Set the Output folder for generated code.

parameter.name: overridePackage
parameter.description: Override java package for the generated classes. If unset, the java namespace from the IDL files is used. If a value is set here, the java package definition from the IDL files is ignored.

parameter.name: usePlainJavaNamespace
parameter.description: Use the 'java' namespace instead of the 'java.swift' namespace.

mojo.description: Display help information on swift-maven-plugin. Call mvn swift:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.

parameter.name: detail
parameter.description: If true, display all settable properties for each goal.

parameter.name: goal
parameter.description: The name of the goal for which to show help. If unspecified, all goals will be displayed.

parameter.name: indentSize
parameter.description: The number of spaces per indentation level, should be positive.

parameter.name: lineLength
parameter.description: The maximum length of a display line, should be positive.
